title: Connections Index - Kenneth Reitz
description: Kenneth Reitz - Creator of Requests and Certifi, trusted by millions of developers worldwide. Thoughts on technology, philosophy, and building software for humans.

text_content: Connections Index The knowledge web — 915 outgoing and 669 incoming cross-references revealing the interconnected nature of ideas. Every internal link from across the site, extracted and presented as a map of intellectual connections. These cross-references reveal how ideas build on each other, creating a web of meaning that transcends individual essays. The Joy of Fortune: Serendipity in the Terminal Essays · September 21, 2025 · 10 outgoing, 0 incoming Outgoing Links → Unix philosophy /essays/2025-08-31-the-case-for-bash → serves consciousness
